alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:03AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallace and west central Logan Counties through 145 AM MDT/245 AM CDT/... At 102 AM MDT/202 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Wallace, or 14 miles northeast of Sharon Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wallace and west central Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
